name: Blackguard Cruiser
description: The Blackguard Cruiser is a modified version of the Bastion Cruiser utilized by the Marauders. It features the Bastion\'s Counter-chain abilities as well as the firestorm overdrive, but instead of having Alien and Plasma Resistance, has Resurgence and Void resistance.
tips-builds: Void Resonnant Armor, Void Shell, Void Ionization, Void Epsilon Echo Cannon, Voltaic Thruster
author: 137B201F8F7AD871
